p: Tables 1 and 2 depict the GC/MS results of L. dentata and O. syriacum essential oils components which are obtained from Figures S1 and S2 (found in the supplementary file). The GC/MS results showed the presence of linalyl acetate and linalool to be the major components of L. dentata essential oil while thymol and carvacrol were the major components of O. syriacum essential oil.
